title: "SGEN:SGEN(0,0): Error : An attempt was made to load..." in release build only
body:
Something strange. I have following error on release build only. 
In the debug build all is ok. 
This is summary from Team Services build.
How can to determine what is wrong?

```
Ran for 7.7 minutes (Hosted VS2017), completed at Sun 12/10/2017 09:44 AM

Request Summary
Request 12	Completed
Summary
| Finalize build
0 error(s), 0 warning(s)
| Phase 1
2 error(s), 123 warning(s)
Phase 1 - 2 error(s), 123 warning(s)
SGEN:SGEN(0,0): Error : An attempt was made to load an assembly with an incorrect format: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\MSBuild\Microsoft\Microsoft.NET.Build.Extensions\net461\ref\netfx.force.conflicts.dll.
Process 'msbuild.exe' exited with code '1'.

```
